abstract: Joan Raymond Frequent Flier column features Alison Provost, chief of TouchStorm, a digital video distribution company, discussing her flying experiences.
snippet: The chief executive of TouchStorm, a digital video distribution company, once had to make a business pitch without benefit of makeup.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of TouchStorm, a digital video distribution company, once had to make a business pitch without benefit of makeup.

headline.main: Makeup. Don’t Leave Home Without It.
headline.print_headline: Makeup. Don’t Leave Home Without It.
